scripts.dev: npm run setup && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared && npm run db:setup
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate
